property.name: MATLAB
property.description: Path to the Matlab installation (needed for access to headers and libraries).

property.name: NIDAQmx
property.value: C:\Program Files\National Instruments\NI-DAQ\DAQmx ANSI C Dev
property.description: Path to the 'DAQmx ANSI C Dev' directory from National Instruments.

property.name: GLib
property.description: Path to the GLib development libraries.

property.name: CLASSDEST
property.description: The path in which to find the @nimex and @nimexEngine class directories.

property.name: NIMEX_VERBOSITY
property.description: 0-4, with 0 being silent and 4 being most verbose.
